name: Vacublast
description:
Vacublast is a game inspired by Laser tag.

  • Kill as many enemies as you can with your Vacugun.
  • Your armor and Vacugun saps power from the same source.
  • Your Vacugun's fire-rate is linked to your battery's percentage.
  • Charge up your battery using the Vacugun's secondary fire mode (mouse 2), by facing incoming laser blasts.
